data.sampled: The message is not properly encrypted. It appears to be an attempt at encryption using a simple substitution cipher where each letter has been replaced by a different random letter. However, this type of encryption does not provide any real security as it can easily be broken by analyzing patterns in the text or trying common words and phrases until they match up correctly. To effectively encrypt information, one should use more secure methods such as public key cryptography which relies on complex mathematical algorithms to scramble data so that only authorized parties can read it.
